snippet.title: Amiga Longplay: Creepy
snippet.description: All 100 levels completed using infinite time and save-states. Imo, this game would be virtually impossible without these cheats as the time limit is extremely tight, and I’m not one for ripping my hair out. The only challenge left is to not become Ourobouros. That is, biting your own tail and thus losing a life. The journey is better than the destination in this case as there’s nothing at the end.
